title: Understanding Data Validity
text: Data validity refers to the accuracy and correctness of data in relation to the real-world scenario it represents. It ensures that data values fall within the expected range or set of values.

title: Identifying Data Quality Issues
text: If a dataset records a temperature of $$200$$ degrees Celsius for a location on Earth, which data quality dimension is being violated?

title: Definition of Data Completeness
text: Data completeness ensures that all required data is present. Missing data can lead to incomplete analysis and decision-making.

title: Checking for Data Consistency
text: A dataset records a person's height as $$180$$ cm in one entry and $$5$$ feet $$11$$ inches in another. Which data quality dimension is being challenged?

title: Understanding Data Uniqueness
text: Data uniqueness ensures that each record is distinct and not duplicated within the dataset.

title: Evaluating Data Uniqueness
text: A customer database contains multiple entries for the same individual with different customer IDs. Which data quality dimension is being violated?
